Producer: Bruce Davey, Mel Gibson, Stephen McEveety
Synopsis: Bo Laramie (Cole Hauser) is a rising movie star, and Rex Harper (Tom Sizemore) is a paparazzo who will stop at nothing to get a provocative photograph of Bo or his wife (Robin Tunney). One night, Rex chases Bo and his family while they're driving and causes a car accident, leaving Bo's wife badly injured and his son (Blake Bryan) paralyzed. Unable to stop the paparazzi from stalking his family, Bo plots meticulous revenge against the men he blames for the accident.
Title: Paparazzi
